author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...GIL HOLDING STEADY AS A TROPICAL STORM...
summary: ...GIL HOLDING STEADY AS A TROPICAL STORM... As of 11:00 AM HST Sat Aug 02 the center of Gil was located near 19.0, -130.5 with movement WNW at 20 mph. The minimum central pressure was 993 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 70 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...GIL HOLDING STEADY AS A TROPICAL STORM... As of 11:00 AM HST Sat Aug 02 the center of Gil was located near 19.0, -130.5 with movement WNW at 20 mph. The minimum central pressure was 993 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 70 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Gil (EP2/EP072025)
